articles.author: Stan Grant
articles.title: What we can learn from Desmond Tutu, a man for whom forgiveness trumped vengeance - ABC News
articles.description: South Africa's flamboyant archbishop was a giant who appealed to our better angels when politicians often catered to our worst and Australia could learn from following his example, writes Stan Grant.
articles.content:
Desmond Tutu showed us that we can triumph over history.
Resentment and vengeance were not for him. As apartheid fell, he set his nation on a more profound path: freedom and forgiveness.
